segments.text: I'm shocked by what I see in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is overflowing, and the woman is just standing there, drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so bold, trying to get cookies right under her nose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy climbing on that stool, and I'm amazed he hasn't fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, like it's the most normal thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be in for a big surprise when she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she'll be more surprised by the water or the children's antics.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm on the edge of my seat, waiting to see what happens next.
segments.speaker: PAR
